Index >  SetCustomDSDataEx

SetCustomDSDataEx()

Description

Sets custom DS data to be used for scanning, the input string is base64 encoded. Custom DS data means a specific scanning profile.

Syntax

.SetCustomDSDataEx(string strBase64);

Parameters

<string> strBase64

The input string which is base64 encoded.

Return value

bool

When false is returned, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

GetCustomDSDataEx()
